title: Hasslong
author: Hasslong
content: Which site I can use for testnet 🙏

comments.author: TryNinja
comments.body: Could you elaborate?Do you want testnet coins? [For Developers] n0nce's Bitcoin Testnet Faucet [~10 tBTC]Do you want to setup your Electrum testnet wallet? [TUTORIAL] - Electrum Testnet Guide (under construction)

comments.author: hugeblack
comments.body: Quote from: Hasslong on October 07, 2023, 08:57:29 PMWhich site I can use for testnet 🙏There is no need to create a separate topic as long as the topics are related. You can ask everything you want about Test net in one place, but what are you trying to learn? I saw that you are asking about several topics related to electrum. You can find what you are looking for here ----> https://electrum.readthedocs.io/en/latest/for testnet coins you can use faucets or PM @n0nce
